channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [KAFKA-10514] failed test StateDirectoryTest.shouldLogStateDirCleanerMessage
item.description:
java.lang.AssertionError:
Expected: a collection containing a string ending with "ms has elapsed (cleanup delay is 0ms)."
but: was empty

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Thank you for catching this! This test seems to be flaky for the reason, you pointed out. I will submit a PR shortly!
